summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff shows multiple functional additions/changes across backend and frontend (authorization, profile/dashboard features, bench UI enhancements, component duplication behavior). With no requirements, there are no identifiable missing requirements; most changes appear unrequested relative to the empty BuildRequest.
